snippet: “Nice Fish,” written by Mark Rylance and Louis Jenkins, will make its debut at the Guthrie Theater in Minneapolis next year.
abstract: “Nice Fish,” written by Mark Rylance and Louis Jenkins, will make its debut at the Guthrie Theater in Minneapolis next year.

headline.main: Mark Rylance Play, Written With a Favorite Poet, Is Coming to Minneapolis Theater
headline.print_headline: Quoting a Poet Leads to Collaborating With Him
